infoMessage: I'm just getting started - more to come soon!
aboutMessage:
Hi, I'm Ekrem Ko√ßak, a passionate frontend developer. I'm very confident in my skills with Angular and have a solid understanding of React as well. Additionally, I have a keen interest in backend development and have had some experience with ASP .NET Core Web API.

My enthusiasm for technology and design drives me to constantly learn and improve. I approach each project with a dedication to delivering high-quality work that exceeds expectations. I enjoy collaborating with others and am always willing to share my knowledge and expertise to help the team achieve the best results possible.

In summary, I am an experienced and skilled frontend developer with a growing interest in backend development. My passion for technology, dedication to quality, and collaborative nature make me an asset to any team.
